name: @webwriter/neural-network
author: Christian Koch
description: Deep learning visualization for feed-forward networks with custom datasets, training and prediction.

name: @webwriter/chemdraw
description: Draw chemical molecules. Add custom highlighting and text descriptions.
author: Raphael Thelen <raphael.thelen@rwth-aachen.de>

name: @webwriter/code
description: Write and run code as a code cell. Supports several languages (HTML/CSS/JS, TypeScript, Python).

name: @webwriter/slides
description: WORK IN PROGRESS: Present content as a sequence of screens (slides, tabs, etc.).

label._: Circuit Construction Kit: AC - Virtual Lab
Circuit Construction Kit: DC - Virtual Lab

name: @webwriter/quiz
description: Add interactive tasks (multiple choice, order, free text, highlighting, or speech input). Make a quiz out of multiple tasks.
author: Frederic Salmen <frederic@fsalmen.de>

name: @webwriter/network
description: Visualization of network topologies. Can represent different kinds of networks.
author: Jorik van Genuchten

name: @webwriter/chemlab
description: Prepare virtual laboratory environments for various topics in chemistry. Includes the building of molecules as well as applications for electrochemistry and acid/base theory.
author: Robin Kreft

name: @webwriter/flowchart
description: Create programming flowcharts with interactive tasks. Translate flowcharts into natural language or pseudo code.
author: Kevin Lu

name: @webwriter/map
description: Geographical map with different terrain options including custom tiling, and GeoJSON support.
author: Jorik van Genuchten

name: @webwriter/block-based-code
description: Write block-based code (e.g. Scratch) and run it.
author: Philipp Lentzen

name: @webwriter/automaton
author: Jorik van Genuchten
description: Build, visualize and interactive automata of different kinds (DFA, NFA, PDA).

name: @webwriter/geometry-cloze
description: Create and view geometry exercises with coloring, styling and labeling options.

name: @webwriter/logic-circuit
description: Create and simulate circuits with logic gates (AND, OR, XOR, etc.).
author: Lukas Schneider
